Charlotte.description: Charlotte is a really great squirrel. She was the first squirrel to approach the Squirrels of IU, and is kind of a big deal around IU campus.

Sampson.description: Sampson is a boy squirrel. He's one of the older squirrels on campus and an all-around grouch.
Sampson.interestingFact: Sampson is a huge proponent of renewable energy.
dislikes: Squirrels that don't put the toilet seat down after using the bathroom
